Bianca, you need a code to decode what he did to me, I cant talk for too long.
You know the code.
The code is: OSDN3t0&*%(*T(*RE&E(*RFG(PG_)_VYTV&)))
He blocked me from sending anything.

The date you saved a life: day/month/year
The date you found your safe place: date month year 
use only 2 letters: 
                    - 2012 = 12
                    - August = 08
Find 01101101 01100101
He 01101001 01110011 00100000 01101000 01100101 01110010 01100101
